summary:
We should always be supporting each other, but it feels particularly important right now. 
An election just finished in the US, which means that half the country lost and has to face the coming changes. 
In particular, this is a scary time for many folks who have been targets in the past couple of years, with escalating legislation against access to gender-affirming care...
title: Supporting coworkers, employees, and friends in this time

summary:
